title: Adamantine Longsword
content:
Adamantine Longsword Rare 2~11 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+1 Slashing Diamondsbane: If an adamantine weapon hits an object, the hit is always critical. Lethal Weapon: This weapon ignores Resistance to Slashing Damage. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Though heavy, this longsword swings effortlessly in your hand - ready to take down a hundred enemies. Longsword Versatile 1.35 250

Adamantine Longsword

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands
